duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, implement, and support analytics solutions using Azure products and services.
Migrate and engineer data using Azure cloud technologies.
Lead development of coding standards, best practices, and privacy and security guidelines.
Mentor others on technical and domain skills to create multi-functional teams.
Implement batch and streaming data pipelines using cloud technologies.
Collaborate within a team environment as well as work independently on technical solutions.
Own and support the product as part of a DevOps team.
Ensure the implementation of data governance and privacy guidelines.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Technology, Information Systems (CIS/MIS), Engineering or related technical discipline, or equivalent experience/training
